about_the_game:
Experience core gameplay that fuses the scope of 4X with the intensity of an Boss Rush. Forge your own vision with factions of unique abilities, take complete control of your city and raid, and defeat terrifying bosses with your sharpened strategy. Your perseverance will be crowned by powerful equipment, territories, raider skills, and ardent raiders joining your raid.




Discover an audacious redesign of the 4X paradigm, sprinkled with never-before-seen challenges, such as :


Engage in tactical encounters that transform balanced battles into disproportionate boss duels. Unmask their weaknesses, for they will be your greatest advantage against opponents who are more powerful than your individual raiders.


Keep your raid's internal quarrels and machinations in line through captivating quests, weaving complex relationships between your raiders.



Immerse yourself in a fictional world where your raiders become aware of the game world and its rules, and don't hesitate to demand riches in return for their services.




Select your unique faction, customize your raid's colors to wear proudly, and recruit elite raiders with strategic abilities. Each raider is unique, persisting even after defeat, ready to rise again for the next battle.




Expanding your empire requires constant territorial growth. Construct buildings that draw on the diversity of biomes, combining assets to maximize resource production. Your empire grows not only in size, but also in sophistication, requiring regular reorganization for constant optimization.
